name: unsplash
description: Enhance Nextcloud with a random background from unsplash

scripts.down: docker exec unsplash-php bash -c 'find ./* -maxdepth 0 -not -name 'custom_apps' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -r --' &&  docker-compose down --volumes
scripts.mkcert: mkdir -p docker/volumes/nginx && mkcert -cert-file docker/volumes/nginx/default.pem -key-file docker/volumes/nginx/default.key localhost unsplash.local && chmod -R 777 docker/volumes/nginx/

author: Jan-Christoph Borchardt
